title: Shadowrun:Dragonfall -Director's Cut (Harebrained Holdings) (ENG
description:
Year of release : September 18, 2014 .
Genre : RPG / Strategy (Indie)
Developer : Harebrained Schemes
Publisher : Harebrained Schemes Publication Type: Digital License (Steam-Rip)
Language: English .
Language: Not required.
Tablet: Is present (3DMGAME)

System requirements :
> Operating system : Windows XP SP3 / Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8
> Processor : x86-compatible 1.4GHz or faster processor
> Memory: 2 GB RAM
> Graphics card : DirectX compatible 3D graphics card with at least 256MB of addressable memory
> Free hard drive space: 7 GB available space

Description:
Shadowrun: Dragonfall - Director's Cut - independent release successful campaign Dragonfall, which first appeared as an extension to the Shadowrun Returns. Director's Cut version includes several enhancements and new content :
5 new missions, alternate endings , new music , redone UI , configuration options team reworked the role system and more.

Features:
Steam Achievements and Steam Trading Cards!
New visual effects and animation .
Advanced selection of spells and items of inventory .
New alternative endings in major campaigns.
Additional adjustment of the character.

Installation and Startup
download the distribution
Select your version of the installation ( * hacked or steam **)
Set the distribution game
Play !
* Anti swears files tablets when installing disable all anti-virus software , and further add to the game folder in your favorites, what would all the files after you restart the pills are still in place .

If you do not start or is not saved , then run the game as an administrator ! ** For normal install a licensed version of Steam client must be closed !.

Shadowrun: Dragonfall - Director's Cut
Game Version 2.0.4 Steam ID: 300550 ;
Steam-Rip is identical to the activated via Steam licensed copy of the game .
